com.deezer.sdk.player

Class RadioPlayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • AbstractPlayerWrapper
      • com.deezer.sdk.player.RadioPlayer

  • public class RadioPlayer
extends AbstractPlayerWrapper
    A PlayerWrapper used to play a Deezer Radio. *

    A RadioPlayer can be launched very easily using the follonwing code : 

     
      RadioPlayer radioPlayer = new RadioPlayer(application, deezerConnect, new WifiOnlyNetworkStateChecker());
      radioPlayer.addPlayerListener(radioListener);
      radioPlayer.playRadio(radioId);
    Author:
    Deezer

    • Constructor Detail

      • RadioPlayer

        public RadioPlayer(android.app.Application application,
           DeezerConnect deezerConnect,
           NetworkStateChecker networkStateChecker)
            throws OAuthException,
                   TooManyPlayersExceptions,
                   DeezerError
        Creates an autonomous RadioPlayer. No parameter can be null
        Parameters:
        application - the current application
        deezerConnect - a deezerConnect object initialised to be used with Deezer Radio
        networkStateChecker - a component able to monitor network availability.
        Throws:
        OAuthException - if the deezerConnect's token is not valid
        TooManyPlayersExceptions
        DeezerError - if deezerConnect is not properly initialized

        public boolean skipToNextTrack()

      • seek

        public void seek(long position)
